Title: 5G
Plot: Don Draper is shaken when his past life comes back to haunt him. After his picture appears in a local newspaper, Adam Whitman, a man who claims to be his younger brother, approaches him. Don, or Dick as his brother knows him, initially denies everything but in the end admits to having taken on a new name. ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Rosemarie DeWitt, Bryan Batt, Maggie Siff, Jim Abele, Anne Dudek
